s-weight

Type:Function
Status:stable
Since:0.0.1
Platform:css
@blackbyte.sugarcss.css.function

This function allows you to get a font weight from the registered ones or from the default ones that are:

  • thin: 100
  • extra-light: 200
  • lighter: 200
  • light: 300
  • regular/normal: 400
  • medium: 500
  • semi-bold: 600
  • bold: 700
  • bolder: 800
  • extra-bold: 800
  • black: 900

Params

  1. weight*-String

    The weight you want to get like “bold”, “light”, etc…

Return

  1. -Css

    The generated css

Example

:root {
   --s-weight-boldeeeeeerrrrrr: 9000;
}

.my-element {
   font-weight: s-weight(bold); // 700
   font-weight: s-weight(light); // 300
   font-weight: s-weight(boldeeeeeerrrrrr); // 9000
}

Author

  • Olivier Bosselolivier.bossel@gmail.comhttps://hello@blackbyte.space
